profile:
Mr. Rooter Plumbing ofOttawa and surrounding area residents and businesses need exceptional plumbing services from trustworthy professionals. Mr. Rooter Plumbing of Ottawa offers a world class customer experience from courteous, clean, and respectful professionals in addition to guaranteed work, up front pricing, and no overtime charges. Our highly-trained staff is standing by 24 hours a day, 7 days a week offering service and appointments at your convenience to help you get your life back on track. Contact Mr. Rooter Plumbing of Ottawa today at (613) 746-0000.

Some of the services that we offer are, Plumbing Repair
Drain & Sewer Cleaning
Commercial Plumbing
Trenchless Technology
Mr. Rooter® Products
licenses: All technicians are licensed plumbers or registered apprentices.

profile:
Dear Plumbing Express customers;
Our highest priority is the health and safety of our clients, as well as our employees and those in our network including our suppliers and delivery partners. We are closely following the direction of the Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) and continue to implement the following protocols that support everyone’s health and well-being to help fight the spread of the COVID-19 virus:

•	Reinforcing our already rigorous standards and operating procedures for product safety and personal hygiene.
•	Working closely with our delivery partners and our own network of drivers to ensure frequent hand washing, using hand sanitizer for every delivery and sanitizing their vehicles and delivery bags.
•	Continual sanitation of all high touch surfaces. 


We have also reinforced with all of our employees the importance that we all work together to prevent the spread of illness in the workplace as we continue to monitor the situation and follow the advice of the Ontario Ministry of Health.





PLUMBING EXPRESS offers Fast & Efficient Service. 

Repairing and replacing plumbing fixtures professionally for over 20 Years. Same day or next day servicing available.

 Having the best stocked service vehicles in Ottawa guarantees our one stop service and repairs. 

From Stittsville to Orleans and everywhere in between! 

Call Today: 613-791-6200

Better Business Bureau accredited: A+ Rating.
Best of 2016 Award
service_area: "From Stittsville To Orleans And Everywhere In Between" Visit Us At www.PlumbingExpress.ca
products: Toilets, sinks, faucets, electric hot water tanks, vanity, kitchen, laundry tubs and MUCH more....
services:
- Repair & replacement of existing plumbing fixtures;
Toilets, sinks, faucets, electric hot water tanks, vanity, kitchen, and tubs.
- Specializing in hook ups of new kitchen/ vanity sinks and faucets
- Drain repair, unblocking, cleaning and CC T.V. camera inspection 
- Faucet installation/ repair.
- Dishwasher installation.
- Mystery leaks
- Toilet repairs/ installation.
- Sinks, tubs and showers.
- Plumbing installation, service and repair.
- Water Meter Installation
- Building/ repairing outdoor faucets
brands:
All Major Brands Including: Moen, Delta, Grohe, American Standard, Gerber And More. 

For more information call us anytime at 613-791-6200
specialities: Best stocked plumbing service vehicles in Ottawa providing our "Guaranteed One Stop Service And Repairs."

profile:
We are a proud Ottawa plumbing company with over a decade of experience delivering top-quality plumbing repairs and services to our neighbours, friends, and business owners who all make this area such a great place to live. Whether you need exterior waterproofing, trenchless water line replacement, trenchless sewer line repair, or weeping tile installation Summit Drain & Plumbing has the experience and team to do it all! 

We are a team of highly skilled professionals, who love what they do. Summit Drain and Plumbing is locally owned and operated. We are proud to provide exceptional service and our friendly team members are always happy to answer any questions. Contact us for a free estimate.
services:
Main drain repair/replacement.
Main waterline upgrade/
Trenchless sewer repair.
